thread.title: Family shocked to find balloon full of drugs stashed in their hand luggage
thread.title_full: Family shocked to find balloon full of drugs stashed in their hand luggage

author: ALYESHA ANDERSON
title: Family shocked to find balloon full of drugs stashed in their hand luggage
text:
A WA family was lucky to escape arrest in Denpasar and Perth airports — after discovering a balloon full of drugs stashed in their hand luggage.
6PR listener Rob, who didn’t identify his surname, called the radio station on Thursday morning to share his family’s astonishing find in his wife’s toiletries bag, upon their return from a holiday in Bali.
“We flew back from Bali two weeks ago,” he said.
“After we got through all the checkpoints and arrived home, we found a balloon filled with white powder that was in our hand luggage.”
Rob said he called the WA Police immediately who came and collected the substance from the family home and conducted tests.
“The only thing I could get confirmation of was that it was drugs,” he said.
“We got through by a miracle of chance.”
WA Police have now passed the investigation into the drug find to the Australian Federal Police.
“I think certainly people need to be aware of everything,” Rob said.
“Because potentially we could still be in Bali on trafficable offences.
“We were there for just a nice holiday.
“It definitely teaches you something — to check everything.”
Australian Federal Police have been contacted for comment.
Originally published as Drugs found in luggage from Bali
